objects.text:
• Premium Faux Leather Design
• Gold Accent Hardware
• Spacious Interior Compartment

The perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life.
Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This elegant ecommerce banner is designed to promote a luxury handbag. It is visually divided into two halves: the left side features key informational and marketing text—including a bold headline `heading`, a stylized sub-brand `subheading`, a bullet-point features list `description`, a short product detail `tagline`, and a prominent price tag `price`. A rounded rectangle `cta_button` hosts a white call-to-action label `cta` inviting users to shop. The right side prominently features a high-resolution product image `product_image`. The layout balances minimalism and sophistication, enhanced by soft background patterns and strokes.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream (#F5EFE6)
- Beige (#E8D9C5)
- Camel (#D4B996)
- Mocha (#5D4037)
- Dusty Mauve (#8D6E63)
- Gold Accent Line (#C9A87C)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish brown leather handbag with gold metallic accents. The dominant color is a muted terracotta brown (#A97465), giving the bag a warm and refined look suitable for a neutral-themed palette. The hardware and brand logo are beautifully highlighted in a shiny metallic gold (#D4AF37), adding an element of luxury. These two colors blend harmoniously, as the matte leather balances the rich sheen of gold. Accents like the lock, chain, and charms create visual interest. Ideal complementary tones for an advertisement banner would include ivory (#F5F5DC) and soft blush pink (#E8C8C0) to enhance elegance and focus.
